TopicTitle: Feedback: I can't see vehicles mass at tracking station.

Articles.Content:
Tracking station i would expect to see mass when i focus on vessel.

When controlling vessel i would expect to see vehicles mass at staging and/or vessel info tab and/or vessel vessel log. 

Edit: Weight can be seen when controlling vessel, at Staging

Edited December 26, 2023 by Jeq
Removed false information.
Now i found weight of vessel, it is shown at stages same way you can see twr. Not sure how i didn't notice this.
